Title:
The Mechanics of the Heart Aka Jack et la Mecanique du Coeur


Country:
France, 2013



Language:

IMDB: <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1181840/?ref_=nv_sr_1" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1181840/?ref_=nv_sr_1</a>


Synopsis:
A 19th-century drama about a man whose heart was replaced with a clock when he was born. The situation dictates that he should avoid feeling strong emotions -- love, most of all -- but he just can't keep his feelings under wraps.


Trivia:
Official Selection Berlin Film Festival 2014
Official Selection Annecy Film Festival 2014
